title: ISketchSegment.SelectChain
description: Selects chains of entities attached to this sketch segment.
signature:
System.Boolean SelectChain( 
   System.Boolean
Append
,
   SelectData
Data
)

parameters.name: Append
parameters.description: True to append to the current selection list, false to replace the selection list

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
Before calling this method call
ISelectionMgr::CreateSelectData
to specify Data.
This method is equivalent to right-clicking a sketch segment and selecting
Select Chain
. The chain of entities in each direction is selected. Selection ends when a branch in the chain is encountered.
